params.taskDescription:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mi>A</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>88</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle A = {88^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mi>B</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>32</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle B = {32^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>m</mi>
  <mi>∡<!-- ∡ --></mi>
  <mi>C</mi>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mn>60</mn>
      <mo>∘<!-- ∘ --></mo>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">m\measuredangle C = {60^ \circ }</annotation></semantics></math>

questionSetStimulus: For the following exercises, classify the triangle with the listed angle measurements as acute, right, or obtuse.
